testCase.name: SnapshotManager capture should capture snapshot with all data
SnapshotManager capture should generate hash for integrity
SnapshotManager save and load should save snapshot to disk
SnapshotManager save and load should load snapshot from disk
SnapshotManager save and load should verify hash on load
SnapshotManager save and load should save with pretty formatting
SnapshotManager save and load should save without pretty formatting
SnapshotManager loadBySessionId should load most recent snapshot by session ID
SnapshotManager loadBySessionId should load snapshot by session ID and timestamp
SnapshotManager loadBySessionId should throw if session not found
SnapshotManager listSnapshots should list all snapshots
SnapshotManager listSnapshots should filter by session ID
SnapshotManager listSnapshots should return empty array when no snapshots exist
SnapshotManager delete operations should delete a snapshot
SnapshotManager delete operations should delete all snapshots for a session
SnapshotManager delete operations should delete all snapshots
SnapshotManager getStats should return statistics
SnapshotManager getStats should return zero stats when no snapshots
SnapshotManager cleanup should keep only N most recent snapshots per session
SnapshotManager cleanup should handle multiple sessions independently
SnapshotManager export should export as JSON
SnapshotManager export should export as YAML
SnapshotManager export should export as text
SnapshotManager export should throw for unsupported format
